alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 1:53PM AKST until February 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW BEGINNING THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY... .A strengthening low with embedded waves will move into the NE gulf Thursday evening with an associated front moving over the panhandle Friday. Dry snow will spread from north to south across the panhandle. The snow will largely fall in two separate waves. A first, and weaker, wave will move through during Thursday night and early Friday morning. A brief lull may be possible Friday morning for some locations before a much stronger wave moves into the panhandle, bringing with it substantially more snow. Some uncertainty exists regarding snow totals due to limited moisture available, particularly for parts of the northern and central inner channels. For most areas the greatest snowfall rates will be Friday evening through early Saturday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to reduced visibility and blowing snow. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light, dry, snow will fall Thursday night resulting in moderate snow accumulations. A brief lull in the snow may occur Friday morning before the second, stronger, wave arrives. The greatest snowfall rates are expected with this second wave Friday afternoon through Friday night before rates begin to diminish early Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
